default.title: CAMBOB - Meet over Meals and Drinks on Campus
default.description: CAMBOB helps university students connect and make friends over shared meals or drinks â€” your campus meal & drink mate platform.
default.keywords: CAMBOB, university, meal mate, drink mate, social campus, dining, meetup, student network

login.title: Login - CAMBOB
login.description: Log in to CAMBOB to meet new meal and drink mates on your campus.

signup.title: Sign Up - CAMBOB
signup.description: Create your CAMBOB account to share meals, drinks, and new connections with other students.

language.title: Change Language
language.description: Which language would you like to use CAMBOB in?

theme.title: Change Theme
theme.description: Which theme would you like to use CAMBOB with?

logout.title: Log out of CAMBOB?
logout.description: Even if you log out, your account information and settings will be safely saved. You can log in anytime to continue using CAMBOB.
